org.universAAL.ri.gateway.configuration

Interface Configuration

  • All Superinterfaces:
    OperationChainManager
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ConfigurationFile

    public interface Configuration
extends OperationChainManager
    Interface for configurating a Session.
    Author:
    amedrano

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  Configuration.ConnectionMode
      Definition of the Connection mode.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Cipher getCipher()
      Get the encryption cipher to be used for the communication link.
      String getConnectionHost()
      Get the Host the Session should connect to.
      Configuration.ConnectionMode getConnectionMode()
      Get the Connection mode intended for the Session represented by this configuration.
      int getConnectionPort()
      Get the port to connect to.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.universAAL.ri.gateway.operations.OperationChainManager

        getExportOperationChain, getImportOperationChain, getIncomingMessageOperationChain, getOutgoingMessageOperationChain

    • Method Detail

      • getConnectionMode

        Configuration.ConnectionMode getConnectionMode()
        Get the Connection mode intended for the Session represented by this configuration.
        Returns:
        the Connection mode.

      • getConnectionHost

        String getConnectionHost()
        Get the Host the Session should connect to.
        For clients this is the hostname of the server.
        For servers this is the interface they have to listen to (default should be 0.0.0.0, i.e: all).
        Returns:
        the Hostname.

      • getConnectionPort

        int getConnectionPort()
        Get the port to connect to.
        For clients this is the port which the server is set up at.
        for servers this is the port which they have to listen to.
        Returns:
        the port.

      • getCipher

        Cipher getCipher()
        Get the encryption cipher to be used for the communication link.
        Returns:
        the Cipher implementation configured for this link.
